The test of DPPH was performed using the methods reported in [ 19], with slight modifications. A solution of the DPPH was prepared by dissolving 100 ml of methanol and 2.4 mg DPPH. 980 μl of DPPH solution (60 μM) was mixed with 20 μl of an extract with concentrations ranging from 10 to 50 μg ml −1. After 2 h of incubation, the absorbance was determined at 517 nm. BHT (10 to 50 μg ml −1) was used as a positive control.
